page.title: 15MY DAY
page.content: Yesterday I got up at 8.30am to go to school. I got my clothes on and had a plate of cornflakes. I then set off for school. In school we did sums and went for our interval at 10.20am. When we got out we played at football. At 10.35am we did English. At 12.05pm we went to the toilet and to get our coats. At 12.15pm we went for dinner. I went home and played with my little brother Stuart. I went back to school straight after my dinner to finish off our game of football. We went back in at 1.15pm and we did some graphs. At 2.10pm we had another interval and after that we went to the library. We left school at 3.30pm and I got my dinner at 4pm. After that I got ready to play football. We were playing at Bellshill in the quarter-final of a Cup. Sadly we were beaten 3-2. I went straight to my bed when I got home.
